perturbation.original_text:
In the event that Oceanic Time Warner Cable removes the above content and or terminates this agreement prior to December 31, 2006, Oceanic Time
Warner Cable agrees to pay a cancellation fee of Five Thousand Dollars ($5,000) per month multiplied by the number of months remain on the
agreement.
perturbation.changed_text:
In the event that Oceanic Time Warner Cable removes the above content and or terminates this agreement prior to December 31, 2006, Oceanic Time
Warner Cable agrees to pay a cancellation fee of Five Thousand Dollars ($5,000). In the event of termination prior to December 31, 2006 due to Watchit's breach of contract, no cancellation fee will apply.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction regarding the cancellation fee. The original text states a $5,000/month fee applies if Oceanic terminates before December 31, 2006. The modified text adds an exception stating no fee applies if termination is due to Watchit's breach, creating uncertainty in enforcement.

perturbation.original_text: This agreement will be in effect until the end of 2006 and will be evaluated at that time.
perturbation.changed_text: This agreement will be in effect until the end of 2006 and will be evaluated at that time. This agreement shall automatically renew for successive one-year terms unless either party provides written notice of termination at least 30 days prior to the end of the then-current term.
perturbation.explanation: The original agreement states it ends at the end of 2006 and will be evaluated. The modification adds an automatic renewal clause, creating a contradiction regarding the agreement's term. This ambiguity introduces uncertainty about whether the contract automatically continues or requires a formal renewal process.

perturbation.original_text: Oceanic Time Warner Cable will use the content solely on channel 777, the Las Vegas channel.
perturbation.changed_text: Oceanic Time Warner Cable will use the content solely on channel 777, the Las Vegas channel. Oceanic Time Warner Cable may also, at its discretion, use the content on other channels as deemed appropriate for promotional purposes.
perturbation.explanation: The original text restricts content usage to channel 777. The modified text allows usage on other channels for promotional purposes, directly contradicting the original restriction. This creates ambiguity as to where the content can be legally displayed, leading to potential disputes.
